core:outcomeLink.core:condition: notEmpty(process.quantitySale) && process.quantitySale && notEmpty(process.quantity) && process.quantity != 1 && notEmpty(process.product) && notEmpty(process.product.posDetails) && process.product.posDetails.disallowQuantityEntry

core:promptState.core:name: Enter Item
core:promptState.core:comment: Current event is output for use when the code is determined to be a loyalty card.

core:eventLink.core:comment: not force unknown and there's a product code, lookup the product code
force unknown, go directly to MMGroup selection
